records.description: Remarks: The customer is Best Vision Development Limited. This is found on Page 179 under the Definitions and Interpretation section, where it states that wherever the term 'Employer/Developer' is used, it refers to Best Vision Development Limited.

records.detail: Tin Shui Wan Town Lot No.23, Tin Shui Wai, New Territorie
records.description: Remarks: The project site is located at Tin Shui Wai Town Lot No.23, Tin Shui Wai, New Territories, This Information is found on page 183, 344, 470 and 67.

search_highlight.title: Total Contract / Liability and Consequential Damages

records.detail: Tin Shui Wan Town Lot No.23, Tin Shui Wai, New Territorie

search_highlight.title: Warranty / Defeat Liability Period / Free Maintenance Period

records.ans: Installation period should not be less than 3 weeks
records.description: Clause 3.14 specifies that the Sub - Contractor shall complete the lift installation works within 60 calendar days upon possession of respective life machine rooms from the main contractor. This timeframe is significantly longer than the 3 - week requirement mentioned provided in the document, the installation cannot be guaranteed to meet the requirement of not being less than 3 weeks.

records.ans: Defects Inspection should not be less than 2 months
records.description: Based on Clause 3.28, the defect inspection and rectification process indeed spans on a total of two months (one month for inspection and one month for rectification). Therefore, the defect inspection process, as outlined, should not be less than 2 months.
